name: Chandrashekher Prasad
aboutMe:
Hi, I'm Chandrashekher, pursuing a B.Tech at Maharaja Agrasen Institue of Technology, New Delhi.

Currently I'm in my second year and enhancing my skills in data structures and algorithms using Java. I have a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and I am currently learning React JS. Additionally, I am proficient in other programming languages such as C, Python, and JavaScript.

Feel free to connect with me for any collaboration or opportunities.
